TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticablePrincipal extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the account and contact data common to principals that can be authenticated.
Initializes a new instance of the class. This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended for use directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自這個類別的自訂延伸模組類別可以呼叫這個建構函式，從衍生的類別建構函式來初始化基底類別。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 主體擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概觀主題。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自這個類別的自訂延伸模組類別可以呼叫這個建構函式，從衍生的類別建構函式來初始化基底類別。 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <<c0> [ 主體擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00)概觀主題。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AccountExpirationDate As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> AccountExpirationDate { Nullable<DateTime> get(); void set(Nullable<DateTime> value); };
member this.AccountExpirationDate : Nullable<DateTime> with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account expires.
Docs.value: A指定日期和帳戶到期的時間或 null 如果帳戶永不到期。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如同所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，傳回的時間是 UTC 格式。 若要將它轉換為當地時間，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法傳回的物件。
當您將設定<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountExpirationDate%2A>，時間會預設為 UTC。 如果您想要撰寫以當地時間，則指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>屬性的您<xref:System.DateTime>物件做為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>。

Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AccountLockoutTime As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> AccountLockoutTime { Nullable<DateTime> get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.
Docs.value: A如果帳戶上設定鎖定時間不是指定日期和時間的帳戶已鎖定或 null。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 帳戶鎖定時間系統而定，且無法設定帳戶管理 api。 若要解除鎖定帳戶，使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.UnlockAccount%2A>方法。
可以可能不會鎖定帳戶時<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.AccountLockoutTime%2A>傳回非 null 值。 應用程式應該使用<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal.IsAccountLockedOut%2A>方法，以判斷是否有此帳戶已鎖定。
如同所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，傳回的時間是 UTC 格式。 若要將它轉換為當地時間，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法傳回的物件。

Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

.method public hidebysig instance void ChangePassword(string oldPassword, string newPassword) cil managed
Public Sub ChangePassword (oldPassword As String, newPassword As String)
public: void ChangePassword(System::String ^ oldPassword, System::String ^ newPassword);

Docs.param: The password that is changed.
The new password.
Docs.summary: Changes the account password from the old password to the new password. Do not use this with a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不適合電腦主體。 呼叫具有這<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>會導致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回。

Docs.exception: The principal has not been persisted.
The new password does not meet the complexity requirements.
The principal is not a user.

member this.DelegationPermitted : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether the account may be delegated.
Docs.value: 如果可以委派帳戶;，否則。
Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Enabled As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Enabled { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.Enabled : Nullable<bool> with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.
Docs.value: 如果主體是已啟用，或如果帳戶尚未保存，則為 null否則。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主體尚未保存在存放區中，如果這個屬性會傳回 null。 保存主體之後，預設啟用的設定將取決於存放區中。 在 AD DS 與 AD LDS 存放區時停用新的主體會保存這些，而 SAM 會時它們會保存，可讓新的主體。 應用程式只能設定此屬性的值之後已保存存放區中。

Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.
The application tried to set a null value for this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExpirePasswordNow() cil managed

Docs.summary: Expires the password for this account. This will force the user to change his/her password at the next logon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，以強制使用者在下次登入時變更密碼。

Docs.exception: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult<System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal> FindByBadPasswordAttempt (System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext context, DateTime time, System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType type);

.method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal> FindByBadPasswordAttempt(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext context, valuetype System.DateTime time, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.MatchType type) cil managed

public: static System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::PrincipalSearchResult<System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::AuthenticablePrincipal ^> ^ FindByBadPasswordAttempt(System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::PrincipalContext ^ context, DateTime time, System::DirectoryServices::AccountManagement::MatchType type);

Docs.param: The object that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

A object that identifies the date and time of the incorrect password try. This parameter is used with the type parameter to determine the range of time in which the returned objects have an incorrect logon try recorded.
A enumeration value that specifies the type of match that is applied to the time parameter.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of authentication principal objects that have an incorrect password try recorded in the specified date and time range.
Docs.returns: A that contains one or more objects, or an empty collection if no results are found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時間會預設為 UTC。 如果您想要以本機時間指定的時間，則指定<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>的屬性`time`物件做為<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local>。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，傳回的時間是 UTC 格式。 若要將它轉換為當地時間，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法傳回的物件。

Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastPasswordSet As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> LastPasswordSet { Nullable<DateTime> get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the Nullable that specifies the last date and time that the password was set for this account.
Docs.value: 可為 Null ，指定的最後一個日期和時間，此帳戶設定密碼。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如同所有<xref:System.DateTime>中的屬性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement>，傳回的時間是 UTC 格式。 若要將它轉換為當地時間，呼叫<xref:System.DateTime.ToLocalTime%2A>方法傳回的物件。

Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PasswordNeverExpires { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PasswordNeverExpires : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the password expires for this account.
Docs.value: 如果這個帳戶的密碼過期否則。
Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PasswordNotRequired { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.PasswordNotRequired : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether a password is required for this account.
Docs.value: 如果需要此帳戶中; 密碼否則。
Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ PermittedLogonTimes { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.PermittedLogonTimes : byte[] with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the times when the principal can logon.
Docs.value: 此帳戶允許的登入的時間。
Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PermittedWorkstations As PrincipalValueCollection(Of String)

Docs.summary: Gets the list of workstations that this principal is permitted to log into.
Docs.value: 允許這個主體登入的工作站可變動清單。
Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RefreshExpiredPassword() cil managed

Docs.summary: Refreshes an expired password.
Docs.exception: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ScriptPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ScriptPath : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the script path for this account.
Docs.value: 此帳戶或如果沒有指令碼路徑則為 null 的指令碼的路徑。
Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetPassword(string newPassword) cil managed

Docs.param: The new password.
Docs.summary: Sets the account password to the specified value.
Docs.exception: Throws an exception if the caller does not have appropriate rights, the new password does not meet password complexity requirements, or for any other reason that the underlying stores reject the password change.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SmartcardLogonRequired { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SmartcardLogonRequired : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether a smartcard is required to log on to the account.
Docs.value: 如果智慧卡，才能登入此帳戶;否則。
Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnlockAccount() cil managed

Docs.summary: Unlocks the account if it is currently locked out.
Docs.exception: An exception occurred when saving the changes to the store.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UserCannotChangePassword { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UserCannotChangePassword : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the user can change the password for this account. Do not use this with a .
Docs.value: 如果不允許使用者變更密碼則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不適合電腦主體。 呼叫具有這<xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>會導致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回。

Docs.exception: The underlying store does not support this property.
This principal object is not a user.
